effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to hit a Jackpot! that fires a Frostbolt Volley dealing 542,592 damage to your primary target and 118,633 damage to up to 8 additional targets. Casting Icy Veins always hits a Jackpot!
Set: Icy Veins causes you to hit a Jackpot! at 100% effectiveness every 10 sec for 30 sec.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your spells and abilities have a high chance to empower the Eye and grant you 387 Intellect up to 20 times, decaying rapidly upon leaving combat. While fully empowered, the Eye instead deals 99,035 Fire damage to enemies or heals allies for 148,560.

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Intellect by 2,029, up to 10,145.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 2.1 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
